ARABIC: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But those who do not have iman in the akhira recoil from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who believe not in the Hereafter turn away from the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but those who do not believe in the Hereafter are ever prone to deviate from the Right Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but those who disbelieve the life hereafter deviate from the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviated from the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, those who believe not in the Hereafter are indeed deviating far astray from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely those who do not believe in the hereafter are deviating from the way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and surely they that believe not in the world to come are deviating from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! those who believe not in the Hereafter are indeed astray from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But those who do not believe in the Hereafter have indeed deviated from that path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are from the path deviating.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and those who do not believe in the Hereafter surely deviate from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are deviating from that Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, those who believe not in the Hereafter are indeed deviating far astray from the Path (true religion Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but those who disbelieve in the Everlasting Life deviate from the Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But those who do not believe in the Hereafter are swerving from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:74] And truly those who do not believe in the Hereafter, in resurrection, reward and punishment, deviate, swerve away, from the path, that is, the route [to salvation].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! those who believe not in the Hereafter) those who do not believe in resurrection after death (are indeed astray from the path) from Allah's religion.
